contentrichtext.text: {{taxobox |status = EX |status_system = IUCN2.3 |regnum = [[Plantae]] |unranked_divisio = [[Angiosperm]]s |unranked_classis = [[Eudicot]]s |unranked_ordo = [[Rosid]]s |ordo = [[Myrtales]] |familia = [[Myrtaceae]] |genus = ''[[Xanthostemon]]'' |species = '''''X. sebertii''''' |binomial = ''Xanthostemon sebertii'' |binomial_authority = [[André Guillaumin|Guillaumin]] |}} '''''Xanthostemon sebertii''''' was a species of [[plant]] in the [[Myrtaceae]] family. It was [[Endemism|endemic]] to [[New Caledonia]]. ==Source== * Jaffré, T. ''et al.'' 1998. [http://www.iucnredlist.org/search/details.php/31311/all ''Xanthostemon sebertii'']. [http://www.iucnredlist.org 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. ] Downloaded on 24 August 2007. [[Category:Xanthostemon|sebertii]] [[Category:Extinct plants]] {{Myrtaceae-stub}}
